name: kite-kubernetes
description: Kite is a self hosted knowledge base and note taking platform. It supports markdown, hierarchical organization and search, providing a simple way to document processes, ideas or internal documentation for teams.
features: Markdown Documentation: Write documentation in markdown with syntax highlighting. Create rich content easily.
Hierarchical Organization: Organize pages in nested folders and categories. Structure knowledge logically.
Full-Text Search: Fast search across all documentation content. Find information quickly.
Version History: Track changes to pages with complete revision history. See how documentation evolves.
Multi-User: Team collaboration with user accounts and permissions. Build knowledge together.
Access Control: Control who can view and edit specific pages. Secure sensitive documentation.
Attachments: Upload files and images to documentation pages. Keep related resources together.
Cross-Linking: Link between pages to create interconnected knowledge. Build comprehensive documentation networks.
Export Options: Export documentation to PDF, HTML, or markdown. Share knowledge in various formats.
Clean Interface: Distraction-free reading and editing experience. Focus on content creation.
Mobile Responsive: Access documentation from any device. Read and edit on the go.
API Access: Programmatic access to documentation for integrations. Automate documentation workflows.
